name: elcarsgss
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0
body: -| wi(w0, wf(c3, cpw(c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cpw(c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cpw(c1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cpw(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wss(cfv(ccarsg, c3), cpw(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(ccarsg, c3)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ P(c1))
⊣ (w0 →(toCaraSiga ` c3)⊆ P(c1))
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈(toCaraSiga ` c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wss(cfv(ccarsg, c3), cpw(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(ccarsg, c3)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 ⊆ c1)
⊣ (w0 →(toCaraSiga ` c3)⊆ P(c1))
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈(toCaraSiga ` c3))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cfv(ccarsg, c3), cpw(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wf(c3, cpw(c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(ccarsg, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wf(c3, cpw(c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))

comment: Caratheodory measurable sets are subsets of the universe. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-May-2020.)
